head.citation-title: Image watermarking algorithm based on multivariate frequency domain transformation and geometric correction基于多元频域变换与几何校正的彩色图像水印算法
head.abstracts: © 2018, Editorial Board of Optical Technique. All right reserved.The new watermarking algorithm based on multivariate frequency domain transformation and geometric correction was proposed. Firstly, the watermark information was encryption based on gravity model, and Multivariate Fourier transformation was used to process the maximum central region of cover image for obtaining the phase and amplitude information. Then watermark embedding mechanism was designed to embed the watermark information into the amplitude parts, and watermark image was output by Inverse Fourier transformation. The training sample of the watermark image was processed by introducing the QWT to DWT coefficients to for training the support vector machine so that completing watermark image geometric correction. The watermark extraction mechanism was established to restore the watermark image based on the correction of watermark image. The test results show that this algorithm can accurately correct the geometric distortion image, and it has higher robustness and anti blind detection ability compared with the current image watermarking scheme.

copyright.$: Copyright 2018 Elsevier B.V., All rights reserved.
